cu.explanation_en: Setting hw_log_level to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause hardware logging configuration failure and prevent proper log output for hardware components.

du.explanation_en: Setting physCellId to a negative value (-1) will cause invalid physical cell ID configuration and lead to cell identification and synchronization issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 physCellId 設定為負值 (-1) 會導致無效的物理細胞 ID 配置，並造成細胞識別和同步問題。
